members.name: primary
members.doc: Primary site category.

members.name: secondary
members.doc: Secondary site category.

members.name: businessTermId
members.doc: Business Term Id

members.name: languageCode
members.doc: Two-letter language code in [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes) format.

members.name: country
members.doc: Two-letter country code in [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements) format.

members.name: languageCode
members.doc: Two-letter language code in [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes) format.

members.name: locale
members.doc: Locale.

members.name: isPrimary
members.doc: Whether the supported language is the primary language for the site.

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: Language icon.

members.name: resolutionMethod
members.doc: How the language will be resolved. For internal use.

docs.summary: Languages supported on a multilingual site.

members.name: supportedLanguages
members.doc: Supported languages list.

members.name: autoRedirect
members.doc: Whether to redirect to user language.

docs.summary: Represents a single street address (which may or may not represent an actual, physical location).

members.name: street
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: country
members.doc: Two-letter country code in an [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: state
members.doc: State.

members.name: zip
members.doc: Zip or postal code.

members.name: hint
members.doc: Extra information to be displayed in the address.

members.name: isPhysical
members.doc: Whether this address represents a physical location.

members.name: googleFormattedAddress
members.doc: Google-formatted version of this address.

members.name: streetNumber
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: apartmentNumber
members.doc: Apartment number.

members.name: coordinates
members.doc: Geographic coordinates of location.

docs.summary:
Extra information on displayed addresses.
This is used for display purposes. Used to add additional data about the address, such as "In the passage".
Free text. In addition the user can state where he wants that additional description - before, after, or instead
the address string.

members.name: text
members.doc: Extra text displayed next to, or instead of, the actual address.

members.name: placement
members.doc: Where the extra text should be displayed.

docs.summary: Geocoordinates for a particular address.

members.name: latitude
members.doc: Latitude of the location. Must be between -90 and 90.

members.name: longitude
members.doc: Longitude of the location. Must be between -180 and 180.

docs.summary: Business schedule. Regular and exceptional time periods when the business is open or the service is available.

members.name: periods
members.doc: Weekly recurring time periods when the business is regularly open or the service is available. Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: specialHourPeriod
members.doc: Exceptions to the business's regular hours. The business can be open or closed during the exception.

docs.summary: Weekly recurring time periods when the business is regularly open or the service is available.

members.name: openDay
members.doc: Day of the week the period starts on.

members.name: openTime
members.doc:
Time the period starts in 24-hour [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) extended format. Valid values are `00:00` to `24:00`, where `24:00` represents
midnight at the end of the specified day.

members.name: closeDay
members.doc: Day of the week the period ends on.

members.name: closeTime
members.doc:
Time the period ends in 24-hour [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) extended format. Valid values are `00:00` to `24:00`, where `24:00` represents
midnight at the end of the specified day.  

__Note:__ If `openDay` and `closeDay` specify the same day of the week `closeTime` must be later than `openTime`.

docs.summary: Exception to the business's regular hours. The business can be open or closed during the exception.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: Start date and time of the exception in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format and [Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coordinated_Universal_Time).

members.name: endDate
members.doc: End date and time of the exception in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format and [Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coordinated_Universal_Time).

members.name: isClosed
members.doc:
Whether the business is closed (or the service is not available) during the exception. 

Default: `true`.

members.name: comment
members.doc: Additional info about the exception. For example, "We close earlier on New Year's Eve."

members.name: essential
members.doc: Whether the site uses cookies that are essential to site operation.

members.name: functional
members.doc: Whether the site uses cookies that affect site performance and other functional measurements.

members.name: analytics
members.doc: Whether the site uses cookies that collect analytics about how the site is used (in order to improve it).

members.name: advertising
members.doc: Whether the site uses cookies that collect information allowing better customization of the experience for a current visitor.

members.name: dataToThirdParty
members.doc: CCPA compliance flag.

members.name: categories
members.doc: Site categories.

members.name: locale
members.doc: Site locale.

members.name: language
members.doc:
Site language.  

Two-letter language code in [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes) format.

members.name: paymentCurrency
members.doc:
Site currency format used to bill customers.  

Three-letter currency code in [ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes) format.

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Timezone in `America/New_York` format.

members.name: email
members.doc: Email address.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Phone number.

members.name: fax
members.doc: Fax number.

members.name: address
members.doc: Address.

members.name: siteDisplayName
members.doc: Site display name.

members.name: businessName
members.doc: Business name.

members.name: logo
members.doc: Path to the site's logo in Wix Media (without Wix Media base URL).

members.name: description
members.doc: Site description.

members.name: businessSchedule
members.doc:
Business schedule. Regular and exceptional time periods when the business is open or the service is available.

__Note:__ Not supported by Wix Bookings.

members.name: multilingual
members.doc: Supported languages of a site and the primary language.

members.name: consentPolicy
members.doc: Cookie policy the site owner defined for their site (before the users interacts with/limits it).

members.name: businessConfig
members.doc:
Supported values: `FITNESS SERVICE`, `RESTAURANT`, `BLOG`, `STORE`, `EVENT`, `UNKNOWN`.  

Site business type.

members.name: externalSiteUrl
members.doc: External site url that uses Wix as its headless business solution

members.name: trackClicksAnalytics
members.doc: Track clicks analytics

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

docs.summary: A single mapping from the MetaSite ID to a particular service.

members.name: serviceType
members.doc: The service type.

members.name: appDefId
members.doc: The application definition ID; this only applies to services of type ThirdPartyApps.

members.name: instanceId
members.doc: The instance ID of the service.

members.name: propertiesChange
members.doc: Properties were updated.

members.name: siteCreated
members.doc: Default properties were created on site creation.

members.name: siteCloned
members.doc: Properties were cloned on site cloning.

members.name: originTemplateId
members.doc: Origin template site id.

members.name: originMetaSiteId
members.doc: Origin site id.

docs.summary: Encapsulates all changes when site properties are updated

members.name: metasiteId
members.doc: ID of the Wix site that has been updated.

members.name: event
members.doc: Update details.

docs.summary: Encapsulates all details written to the Greyhound topic when a site's properties are updated.

members.name: metasiteId
members.doc: The site ID for which this update notification applies.

members.name: event
members.doc: The actual update event.

members.name: translations
members.doc: A convenience set of mappings from the MetaSite ID to its constituent services.

members.name: changeContext
members.doc: Context of the notification

docs.summary: The actual update event for a particular notification.

members.name: version
members.doc: Version of the site's properties represented by this update.

members.name: fields
members.doc: Set of properties that were updated - corresponds to the fields in "properties".

members.name: properties
members.doc: Updated properties.

docs.summary: Snapshot of latest site properties.

members.name: metaSiteId
members.doc: The site ID for which this snapshot applies.

members.name: version
members.doc: Version of the site's properties current snapshot.

members.name: properties
members.doc: Snapshot properties.

members.name: changeContext
members.doc: Context of the notification

members.name: siteDisplayName
members.doc: Site display name.

members.name: businessName
members.doc: Business name.

members.name: logo
members.doc: Path to the site's logo in Wix Media (without Wix Media base URL).

members.name: description
members.doc: Site description.

members.name: email
members.doc: Publicly-available business email address.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Publicly-available business phone number.

members.name: fax
members.doc: Publicly-available business fax number.

members.name: address
members.doc: Publicly-available business address.

docs.summary: The parameters of a site properties read request.

members.name: fields
members.doc:
List of fields to return.
 If omitted, all fields are returned.

docs.summary: The resulting properties for the requested site.

members.name: version
members.doc: Current version of the stored property site. For internal use.

members.name: properties
members.doc: Properties for the requested site.

docs.summary: The request used to update a site's properties.

members.name: properties
members.doc:
The updated properties and their respective values. The subsequent "fields" property determines
which properties are actually considered for updating; specifying the default value for a masked property
deletes the property from the store.

members.name: fields
members.doc: The properties to be updated. Properties not explicitly specified here are ignored. Properties included here but excluded from `properties` are cleared.

docs.summary: The details resulting from an update operation.

members.name: version
members.doc: The new version of the stored properties after the update. For internal use.

docs.summary: The request used to update site's default consent policy

members.name: consentPolicy
members.doc: Default consent policy defined by the site owner. Can be further limited by site visitors.

members.name: businessProfile
members.doc: The site's business profile.

members.name: fields
members.doc: The properties of `businessProfile` to be updated. Properties not explicitly specified here are ignored. Properties included here but excluded from `businessProfile` are cleared.

members.name: businessContact
members.doc: The site's business contact information.

members.name: fields
members.doc: The properties of `businessContact` to be updated. Properties not explicitly specified here are ignored. Properties included here but excluded from `businessContact` are cleared.

members.name: businessSchedule
members.doc: The site's business schedule in the site time zone.

members.name: sites
members.doc: Sites ids.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. The ID of the resolved MetaSite for the request.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type object

docs.summary: The resulting properties for the requested site.

members.name: sites
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. The ID of the resolved MetaSite for the request.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • QUERY_PARAM
  • SUBDOMAIN
  • SUBDIRECTORY

Where the extra text should be displayed: before, after or instead of the actual address. Possible values are:
  • BEFORE
  • AFTER
  • REPLACE

Enumerates the days of the week. Possible values are:
  • MONDAY
  • TUESDAY
  • WEDNESDAY
  • THURSDAY
  • FRIDAY
  • SATURDAY
  • SUNDAY
